A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Potentially the worst Star Wars film ever made. Good for cheap mindless fun\, destroying a franchise\, and unceremoniously ending the stories of some of the most beloved film characters in history\, while at the same time negating nearly everything set up in the first film of the new trilogy. It will leave even the most dedicated fan of the series wondering why they've even bothered investing the time they have if this is what it has come to.
